data.text: @RakJhun Hello sir my name is ravnesh Shakya from greater Noida utter Pradesh sir mera kafi loss hua h banknifty m 90,000 ka sir isko kese recover kare please help me sir my number 9315680906 mujhe sir trading sikhni h please suggest best company thank u sir

@RakJhun please help me
 i have no help
I want to start a new business, for this I want a loan of 65 lakhs from you as a help I will return the entire money in 5 years
Note, Sir, with your help of 65 lakh rupees, any difference in your life will be saved in the life of a poor 🙏🙏

@RakJhun CCP is a bullshit strategy Because it is only first level thinking. What they are showing is things what everyone knows.

You make money in markets by second level thinking.
